dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.text1: Welcome to your personal dashboard! Here you can easily manage your orders, track delivery status, view purchase history, and update your personal information.
dashboard.text2: Your personal dashboard is designed to make your shopping experience more convenient and enjoyable!
dashboard.text3: On this page you will find all your orders made in our online store. Information about each purchase is conveniently collected here: order number, date of placement, delivery status, and product details.
